meanings.definition: A breed of large herding dog with a thick white coat.
meanings.sent1: Samoyeds are known for their fluffy white fur.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of samoyeds playing in the park.
meanings.sent3: The samoyeds had a snowball fight, their coats blending with the snow.
meanings.sent4: The samoyeds moved gracefully through the field, like clouds drifting in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The children were delighted to pet the soft samoyeds at the petting zoo.

meanings.definition: Plural form of samoyed, referring to multiple dogs of the same breed.
meanings.sent1: We visited a farm with many samoyeds running around.
meanings.sent2: The samoyeds barked happily as they played together.
meanings.sent3: The samoyeds formed a line to greet the visitors, wagging their tails.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the herd of samoyeds looked like a fluffy cloud on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The competition showcased the beauty and agility of the samoyeds.
